description: We have made a line of chunky knits with our own version of the Setesdal pattern, knitted with a fantastic yarn from the Italian spinner Linsieme. This spinner is specialiced in cashmere blends and we have fallen in love with this chunky, yet light yarn, made with fine merino wool and cashmere. We have made a classic crew neck sweate that is warm and comfortable, as well as stylish. Wear it as a midayer with your ski outfit, or paired with your favorite jeans for apres ski.
name: We Norwegians Setesdal Crew Neck - Mens
